FP1 (FRI): 17:00 - 18:30
FP2 (FRI): 21:00 - 22:30
FP3 (SAT): 18:00 - 19:00
Quail (SAT): 21:00 - 22:00

Location: Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya

https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-05-16/monaco-grand-prix-guide-formula-1-s-richest-race-in-monte-carlo
Previewing the Monaco Grand Prix

https://www.auto-motor-und-sport.de/formel-1/mercedes-ferrari-red-bull-f1-konzept-vorteil/

There are a few tracks in the calendar where the Ferraris SF90 could be the better car. Because there the proportion of corners is smaller than the proportion of straights.

Bahrain was such a case. Montreal, the Red Bull Ring, Spa, Monza and Sochi could also fall into the profile of the Ferrari.
